title: Assyrian Bible - Gospel of John
description: An Assyrian translation of the New Testament. Neo-Assurian, or Suret, is a language spoken in Iraq, Iran, and Syria.

language.name: Assyrian Neo-Aramaic
language.area: Northern Iraq, Baghdad, Basrah, Karkuk, Arbil. Also in Armenia, Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Cyprus, France, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Iran, Italy, Lebanon, Netherlands, New Zealand, Russian Federation (Europe), Sweden, Switzerland, Syria, Turkey (Asia), United Kingdom, United States.
